parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrochromic Self-Dimming Interior Rear View Mirror Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrochromic self-dimming interior rear view mirror can cause glare from rear approaching headlights, leading to blindness or reduced rear view capability, which can increase the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The mirror leaks liquid crystal fluid
the mirror becomes cloudy or foggy
the mirror fails to dim
the mirror has a blotched or faded appearance
the mirror causes glare from rear approaching headlights.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden and unpredictable stalling of the engine can cause loss of power, increasing the risk of accidents, especially when driving at high speeds.
symptoms: The engine dies while driving
no warning lights or indicators before the engine stops
sporadic occurrence
difficulty diagnosing the problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Electrical System Failure (Headlamp and Brake Lamp Issues)
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of headlamps and brake lamps can reduce visibility, increasing the risk of accidents, and compromise safety.
symptoms: Headlamps and brake lamps go out
bulbs melt
frequent replacement of bulbs
electrical testing reveals no issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A battery explosion can cause damage to the vehicle, injury to occupants, and potentially lead to a fire.
symptoms: Battery explosion after parking the vehicle for an extended period
difficulty starting the engine.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the throttle position sensor can cause delayed acceleration, surging, and inconsistent engine performance, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates or stalls when accelerating
the vehicle surges or accelerates suddenly
the vehicle takes 5-6 seconds to respond to gas pedal input
inconsistent engine performance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air mass meter can cause poor engine performance, decreased fuel efficiency, and increased emissions, which can lead to decreased vehicle safety and reliability.
symptoms: The engine runs rough or stalls
the vehicle has poor acceleration
the vehicle has decreased fuel efficiency
the check engine light is illuminated.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine stalling and hesitation can cause the vehicle to lose power and momentum, leading to potential accidents, especially in heavy traffic or when merging onto highways.
symptoms: The engine dies while driving
the vehicle hesitates when taking off and accelerating
the acceleration is restricted or bogged down
the vehicle stalls despite proper clutch engagement.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the electronic throttle control system can cause the vehicle to hesitate or stall, leading to a loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates when taking off and accelerating
the acceleration is restricted or bogged down
the vehicle stalls despite proper clutch engagement
the computer software takes over and prevents proper acceleration.
